name: Lightspeed Hideout
description:
Defend your city against a huge spaceship!

Keyboard controls

  • Arrow keys to move, X to jump/interact and C to shoot
  • WASD to move, J to jump/interact and K to shoot
  • P to pause
  • M to mute the music/sounds
  • R to quickly retry

Gamepad controls

  • Left stick/D-Pad to move, A/Y to jump and RT/X/B to shoot
  • Start to pause
  • Select to quickly retry

If you are using private browsing the game won't work properly!

Credits

  • Font: C&C Red Alert by N3tRunn3r
  • Game engine: https://heaps.io/
  • Graphics: Aseprite, SpriteMancer, Blender
  • Music/SFX: Bitwig Studio, Microtonic Beatspace, Rough Rider, Session Strings 2, Studio Drummer, Synplant, Synth1, TAL Bitcrusher, Valhalla Supermassive, Vexengo SPAN, Vital
